item.title: Stop benchmarking in the lab: Inclusion Arena shows how LLMs perform in production
item.description: Researchers from Inclusion AI and Ant Group proposed a new LLM leaderboard that takes its data from real, in-production apps.

item.title: LLMs generate ‘fluent nonsense’ when reasoning outside their training zone
item.description: Chain-of-Thought isn't a plug-and-play solution. For developers, this research offers a blueprint for LLM testing and strategic fine-tuning.

item.title: DeepSeek V3.1 just dropped — and it might be the most powerful open AI yet
item.description: China's DeepSeek has released a 685-billion parameter open-source AI model, DeepSeek V3.1, challenging OpenAI and Anthropic with breakthrough performa...

item.title: Qwen-Image Edit gives Photoshop a run for its money with AI-powered text-to-image edits that work in seconds
item.description: Qwen-Image-Edit caters to professionals who need control while remaining approachable for casual experimentation.

item.title: Keychain raises $30M and launches AI operating system for CPG manufacturers
item.description: Keychain states it's currently being used by top CPG brands and food retailers including 7-Eleven, Whole Foods, and General Mills.
